replies.body: Why does {{champion:64}} never get any skin sales!?
Because Rito won't {{champion:64}} to us!
I see what u did there
{{champion:64}} didn't
I knew you would do that... {{champion:26}}
is this the real life?
no this is league of legends
No, this is PATRICK
My wallet is safe for another month
is it really *cough* steam summer sale *cough*
ohhhh... That's why my wallet disappeared yesterday
My wallet left me a "Dear John" letter on my desk top this morning... Now it all makes sense....
YORICK IS ON SALE...THEY NOTICED HIM!!!!!!!!!!
Who's Yorick?
{{champion:83}} {{item:3151}}
He's been on sale before, but he's never ever free to play for the week.
ikr! he better be available soon -.-

no riot must rename him from the Grave Digger to the "Forgotten One"
EDIT: And never put him on free week
He was free Two years ago, I believe ;P

Can we get an option for those of us to spend our measely 132 RP?
Like 10 RP for a LoL themed sugar cookie to be shipped to us in 2 business days?!
I'd like a {{item:2052}}

POOL PARTY {{champion:201}} SKIN FOR SUMMER PLEASE!! Includes:
-Red Life Guard Speedo
-Goggles
-Nose Covered in Sunblock
-Giant Red Cooler as shield (Q & R Shoots Ice as usual)
-Tribal Arm Band Tattoos
-Flip Flops

PLEASE MAKE THIS HAPPEN!
He JUST came out. You people are so impatient. >.>
Yeah but you gotta admit that does sound pretty legit
What do you mean, "you people"? {{champion:236}}
we want icedrake shyvana..not these
Dont say "we" when you just mean you.
i wouldn't mind it. just sayin.
I do not understand. Please rephrase your sentence.
KILL IT BEFORE IT LAYS EGGS!
KILL IT WITH FIRE
Is it just me or does anyone else read the "rito" in this voice. {{champion:115}}
I think it's just you....
RIOT make a new skin: Frog'maw and buff him... {{champion:96}}
{{champion:236}} does need a new skin besides Ashy Lucian
president lucain
Green Card Lucian
I'd suggest Officer Lucian
How about {{champion:412}} .....
How about {{champion:154}} ...
How about {{champion:121}}....
I'm pretty sure Riot said that these soccer skins (the 2014 ones) are here to stay.
BATTLECAST KOGMAW
**BATTLECAST SKARNER!!!!**

Do you even know what Battlecast symbolizes?
Battlecast symbolized Viktor taking over the void creatures and making them part of the revolution. Skarner doesn't make any sense, sorry m8 {{item:3198}} just make skarner a void creature and it works 3:
Also {{champion:101}} has one too. And battlecast {{champion:72}} has been seen in the splash arts for battlecast {{champion:31}} and {{champion:112}} .
Thank you riot. We summoners really appreciate you doing this
You're ignoring two of the biggest problems with LoL. Namely, you still havent given us back URF, And also that Kayle doesnt have a Samus Aran skin.
